title: Blended Teaching Method-Based Education Program for Enhancing Cybersecurity Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and comprehension of network concepts
context.additional_context: Utilizing blended instructional methods applying UDL, dual coding, continuity principles, and multiple intelligence theory in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of major cybersecurity threats (phishing, ransomware, etc.) and vulnerabilities.
Learners can design secure communication methods by analyzing cryptography fundamentals and security protocol application cases.
Learners can establish personal and organizational security measures using risk management frameworks (e.g., ISO 27001).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
